name: AOPII
description:
Befriending the new kid at school usually isn't a problem... until they have more in common with you than meets the eye.

Nova is just trying to finish high school when a new kid joins her class- however, she later finds out that they have something big in common and slowly become friends. Originally made for the Brain Jam, AOPII is a short visual novel that talks about living with mental health problems while still being in school.

Art, story, and programming: MikomiKisomi (me)

Music: Sinakhai (Farekh Ahl Vanat)

This game was made using Ren'Py.

AOPII is 100% free, but the name your price option is there in case you're feeling generous!
